subject: Re: Entegra Website
preview: Hi Jamie,I think we should be fine, it's only a files compressor, if anything their pagespeed score may go down but the actual speed benefits would be minimal.

full_threads.body:
Hi Jamie,

I think we should be fine, it's only a files compressor, if anything their pagespeed score may go down but the actual speed benefits would be minimal.

Hi Joel,

That's ok for now as long as that has no other impact? Do you think it's safe?

Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au

Hi Jamie,

We have fixed the issue by deactivating the "Fast Velocity Plugin", we think there is incompatibility of the scripts when it is minified.
We have deactivate the plugin for now. Let me know if this is ok?

Hi Joel,

There's also an issue with the mobile menu. It doesn't seem to be working at all. Can you have a look at this too?

Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Here a quick link for you to check: https://www.entegra.com.au/

Great!

Can you make those changes live?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek

Can you please add a new link next to the request a quote button? And link this page - https://www.entegra.com.au/affiliates-program/

Thanks,
Jamie

Hi Jamie, 

We have done some updates on the footer. Here is a quick link for you to check: https://entegra.wpperk.com/

Let me know if this ok? we will apply it on the live site.

@joel looking good!!

Can you please: 

  1. Column 1, delete the second sentence 'The company will always make decisions based on what is right rather than the bottom line.'
  2. Column 2, change DAIRY AND FEEDLOT to sentence case and make sure these are in the same order as the drop down menu above
  3. Column 3, change OUR CAREERS to sentence case
  4. Column 4, the font colour when you type your email address looks likes it's white? 

Hover links, can you please change them to the green as currently the dark blue is hard to see against the grey. Thanks!!

@heath Let me know if this is ok? 

https://entegra.wpperk.com/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Great, thats perfect. The Mailchimp plugin is already installed and hooked up to an account.


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie, 

Ok great, we will have it ready for you after lunch. 

Regarding the design, we will use the existing style sheets for the first pass and then you can advise if you want any tweaks. I'm also assuming we use the MailChimp WP plugin to place the form?

Hi Heath,

Option 1 sounds the smartest to me. Best invoice for the hours with this one.

Is the wireframe attached enough to get going or do you need the designed footer?



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// A Level 1, 616 Balcombe Road, Black Rock, 3193 VIC


The material contained in this email may be confidential, and may also be the subject of copyright and/or privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete it. Internet communications are not secure and accordingly Maker's Mark Creative does not accept any legal liability for the contents or damage caused by this message.

Hi Jamie, 

Sure, as we don't have a staging install for this site (and potentially no cPanel access), we could tackle it by: 

  1. Taking a clone of the site and installing it temporarily on our staging servers
  2. Making the code updates to the footer for your review and approval 
  3. Applying these changes to the live site via the WordPress built in editor (Appearance > Editor) 
Let me know if this works for you? We estimate it will take 1 - 2 hours all up. We can invoice for just the hours or of course we can pop them on a WP Perk Plan and do this as part of the onboarding at no additional charge. Either way is fine for us - let me know?

Hi Heath,

How would you feel about doing some dev work on the entegra.com.au website?

We need the footer rebuilt with a mailchimp signup form. I made an attempt using the theme config/widgets etc but the themes styles are all out of whack so the footer CSS (and maybe markup) may will need altered.

Let me know if you are interested.

Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative
